climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: Powerful Clean - CLEARALIF laundry detergent sheets consist of surfactants and enzymes that help remove various stains like oil, red wine, blood, and coffee from your clothes.

Gentle for Sensitive Skin - CLEARALIF contains no irritating ingredients that cause skin issues . It not only gets rid of stains with incredible cleaning power but, more importantly, protects your delicate skin.

Eco-Friendly & Zero Waste - All the ingredients in CLEARALIF like surfactants and enzymes are friendly to the environment and can be easily decomposed. In addition, we use recyclable materials for packaging to avoid pollution: No plastic bottles, no plastic pollution!

Easy to Carry - Laundry sheets occupy little space in your drawer or cabinet. As they are as light and thin as pieces of paper, if you travel a lot, you can take out a few sheets and put them in your suitcase. They add almost no weight to your luggage. Without having to worry about liquid leakage, the only thing you need to do is to create happy memories with friends and family.

Easy to Use - Every piece of sheet has been pre-cut and pre-measured. Measuring cups are no longer needed. Laundry sheets dissolve quickly in both hot and cold water and can be used in conventional and HE washing machines.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Developing green and useful products is what we are going after. Each laundry sheet weighs equal a sheet of paper!You don't need to measure the dosage. Because 1 sheet is equal to 1 cap of liquid detergent or 1 pod.Put a laundry sheet and your clothes into the washer, turn on the machine, and that’s it!Suitable for both conventional and HE machines. Front & Top loading

Why choose CLEARALIF laundry detergent sheets? What we pursue is to make cleaning more convenient and green. And that’s why we set up Clearalif team. Your purchase will contribute to not only the growth of a green brand but the development of a sustainable community. Let’s take the opportunity to heal the world. Join Clearalif Family today! Plastic and chemical pollution are serious problems that concern us all.We use green ingredients such as surfactants and enzymes to prevent chemical pollution.We employ decomposable packaging to combat plastic consumption.With compression technology, we removed the liquid in our products and made them more portable, which enables us to simplify packaging. Therefore, we can transport more goods at one time to save fuel and reduce carbon emission.

DISSOLVE QUICKLY Detergent sheets dissolve quicklyWork well in both hot and cold water with no residue. Only 1 sheet is needed for the full clean of 1 load. DEEP CLEANING Clean clothes with surfactants and enzymes 65 sheets for 130 average size loadsCan be used with hand/sink washing PERFECT FOR SENSITIVE SKIN No irritating ingredients that cause skin issues,No harmful chemicals,Works with all machines including HETakes up virtually no space

CLEARALIF laundry detergent sheets are as good as big brands but more affordable. You'll find it's totally worth it! Each box contains 80 sheets.Up to 160 LoadsIf you only have a few clothes to wash, half a sheet is enough to remove all the stubborn stains. By the way, even 1/2 of our detergent sheet is bigger than a normal laundry strip, providing you with stronger cleaning power.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These laundry sheets are great! They have a nice lavender scent that is not too strong and leave my clothes smelly fresh and clean. I simply toss one sheet on top of the clothes in the washing machine, and voila! I have found that they do dissolve better on "normal" wash vs "quick wash." I mostly wash with cold water, and they work very well. I love that they are better for the planet and take up significantly less room in my small laundry room. I will definitely keep buying these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sustainable, affordable, and easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: The “mint” scent sort of smells like the inside of a “ Lush” bath products store and is surprisingly delightful. The product cleans clothes really well and the scent is light. The price is so affordable and honestly this product has really simplified my laundry room because it’s 1 product that isn’t bulky and doesn’t take up space. I put the sheets in a reusable metal container with a lid, and it looks so much nicer than huge bottles of detergent that drip and whatnot. This is a super sustainable option, as the lack of water within the product means you’re only paying for and shipping the actual soap, not just water and packaging. Have been using these sheets for about 2 years and I love them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these laundry detergent sheets! They are so convenient and easy to use. No more measuring, spilling, or lugging heavy bottles around. Just toss one sheet in the washer and you're good to go. They dissolve quickly and leave my clothes smelling fresh and clean. They also work great for hand washing delicate items. I have sensitive skin and these sheets don't irritate me at all. They are eco-friendly, biodegradable, and cruelty-free. What more could you ask for? I highly recommend CLEARALIF Laundry Detergent Sheets to anyone who wants a hassle-free and effective laundry solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these sheets. It has made laundry so much easier. No more messy drips and spills of liquid detergent. Extremely convenient to use and travel with. We often stay in airbnb's with a washer and dryer and this is so easy to take along. A few sheets in a ziploc bag and we are good to go! The clothes gets clean and no scent and irritation to my sensitive skin. I use cold water for most of my laundry and it dissolves with no problem. Will never buy liquid detergent again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: There's nothing I don't like about these laundry sheets. They're clean (no messy dripping), don't use plastic, and do a great job. They get my clothes cleaner than any liquid soap I've used. Not perfume-y, the scent is very light and clean. They're also less expensive than other brands. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I love these laundry sheets they clean so well and smells very good. I’m amazed. I didn’t think the product would be so great. I have been using these for about four months. Now I no longer use tide and the great thing about these are easy to carry less water, or should I say no water in the product they clean and smell very well I will say again I would highly recommend if you’re looking for a product that cleans and smells very good. This will be the best thing to use and the weight of the product is amazing , you’re not caring a 20 pound jug of laundry detergent a fraction of that you caring less than a pound of a months worth of products that does what is supposed to do I highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This detergent is legit
reviews.reviewText: My skin is literally the worst. It’s so sensitive that if I use the wrong detergent I will have hives FOR DAYS (even after showering and re-washing my clothes in the detergent I know works). I live in a somewhat remote area, so if my local grocery store runs out of detergent I’m pretty screwed.Took a chance on these sheets and what do you know, THEY ARE AWESOME. I waited until I was almost done with the box to write a review for the sake of accuracy.Here are some straight facts:- I bought the box in August 2023, and I still have about a month’s supply left.- I do somewhere between four to five loads of laundry every week.- Following the directions regarding how many sheets to use worked super well for me. They dissolve fast and don’t leave residue. So they can also work for those who have a washer/dryer combo machine.- I bought the citrus-scented sheets and my obnoxiously sensitive skin is perfectly happy. The scent is very light but leaves your clothes funk-free.- I love how easy the sheets are to use and that I’ve been able to eliminate the need for big plastic detergent jugs (being eco-friendly is punk rock!!).- I’ve saved a ton of money by using this stuff!!! And in this wretched economy, that’s pretty legit.So if you’re looking for a good alternative to liquid detergent or pods, need something for your sensitive meat suit cover, or you just want to be punk rock, I highly recommend.
Smell is perfect, not too much, not too little. And cleans really well. I suggest cutting them in 1/2 to make them last twice as long as suggested if it's just a regular wash load.
I don't have sensitive skin, so I cant judge that. The clothes smell good and quarter sheet seems to do for most of my loads. I'll order again.

Smells nice, not overwhelming. Best deal for my money, I use only laundry strips and found I was having to buy them often because only 32 came in a pack at the store. I love not having plastic bulky laundry bottles in my laundry room. Cleans well, no complaints here.
It smells good , easy to carry and no land fill waste. And does a good job on cleaning.
